docs.summary: Create a winning dispute evidence

Creates new evidence object in Dispute Case
 Note: It is necessary to provide right `evidence_type`. This field is immutable and cannot be changed after creation
 Note: It is impossible to upload the document on this call. To reach the document, use [Generate Evidence Upload Url](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/generate-evidence-upload-url?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

examples.title: Add evidence

extra.description: Add evidence to the dispute case object

docs.summary:
Synchronously attaches uploaded documents to the corresponding evidence.
 Note: this call doesn't allow to upload document. To upload file use [Generate Evidence Upload Url](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/generate-evidence-upload-url?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

examples.title: Attach evidence document

extra.description: Attach uploaded evidence document to the dispute case object

docs.summary: Clear uploaded document and remove it from associated evidence

examples.title: Clear evidence document

docs.summary:
Create Dispute Case Object
 Fields `product_type`, `dispute_reason` and `dispute_info` are mandatory. These fields help the service to suggest the right template, gather additional data from Wix ecosystem and pre-generate some of the evidence.
 Fields `product_type`, `dispute_reason` and `dispute_info` are immutable and cannot be changed after creation of Dispute Case object
 `business_description` and `cover_letter` also will be included to final evidence document

Delete Dispute Case object with all evidences
 Note: all uploaded documents also will be removed

extra.description: Delete dispute case object by id

docs.summary:
Generate upload URL to upload the file and associate it with specific evidence using file id.
 `dispute_case_id`, `evidence_id` and `file_name` is required to generate appropriate path for file
 Note: after uploading file using upload url and token document will automatically updated in corresponded evidence but here also exists synchronous call to trigger system directly check uploads - [Attach Uploaded Evidence Document](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/attach-uploaded-evidence-document?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

extra.description: Generate upload URL to upload the file

docs.summary:
Allows getting Final Evidence Document compiled from all auto-generated and user-provided data.
 Note: document URL is temporary and cannot be used as a static link.
 Note: the document comes in a PDF format.

extra.description: Get compiled evidence document by dispute case id

docs.summary:
Get Dispute Case object by id
 Note: this object contains general information about [Dispute Case](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/dispute-case-object?localViewerId=oleksandrdo). It doesn't contain links to the document.

examples.title: Get dispute case

extra.description: Get dispute case object by id

docs.summary:
Allows getting all documents links by providing evidence ids.
 Note: download URLs are temporary (usually token expired in 10 minutes) and cannot be used as static links.

extra.description: Get evidence documents by dispute case id

docs.summary: Regenerates cover letter to original (or its new version if some description properties were updated).

examples.title: Regenerate cover letter

docs.summary:
Remove uploaded evidence from Dispute Case
 Note: it is impossible to reuse the document uploaded and attached to specific evidence.

extra.description: Remove evidence from the dispute case object

docs.summary:
Update `business_description` and `cover_letter` in [Dispute Case object](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/dispute-case-object?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)
 Note: fields `product_type`, `dispute_reason` and `dispute_info` are immutable and cannot be updated here
 Note: to update evidence, use [Update Dispute Case Evidence api call](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/update-dispute-case-evidence?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

examples.title: Update dispute case

params.name: evidence.id
params.doc: unique evidence id in scope of the case

docs.summary:
Allows to update evidence fields `name` and `description`.
 Note: this call cannot be used to update documents. To update the document, use [Attach Uploaded Evidence Document](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/attach-uploaded-evidence-document?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

examples.title: Update evidence

docs.summary: external dispute information from wix-payments transaction service

members.name: accountId
members.doc:
account id from wix-payments transaction service
 [wix.payments.transactions.v3.transaction.Transaction.account_id]

members.name: transactionId
members.doc:
transaction id from wix-payments transaction service
 [wix.payments.transactions.v3.transaction.Transaction.id]

members.name: disputeId
members.doc:
dispute id from wix-payments transaction service
 [wix.payments.transactions.v3.transaction.Transaction.Dispute.id]

members.name: productType
members.doc:
type of product the dispute was opened
 Note: it is immutable field and update operation will be ignored

members.name: disputeReason
members.doc:
generalised dispute reason from reason code provided by bank
 [wix.payments.transactions.v3.transaction.Transaction.Dispute.DisputeReason]
 Note: it is immutable field and update operation will be ignored

members.name: disputeInfo
members.doc:
external dispute information from wix-payments transaction service
 Note: it is immutable field and update operation will be ignored

members.name: businessDescription
members.doc: merchant business description for including into dispute document

members.name: evidences
members.doc: list of evidences associated with the dispute case

docs.summary: Dispute evidence object represents user provided or auto-generated file evidence

members.name: id
members.doc: unique evidence id in scope of the case

members.name: type
members.doc:
type of evidence
 Note: it is immutable field and update operation will be ignored

members.name: fileName
members.doc: name of uploaded file document. See [Generate Evidence Upload Url Request call](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/all-apis/dispute-case/generate-evidence-upload-url?localViewerId=oleksandrdo)

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • FRAUD_CARD_PRESENT
  • FRAUD_CARD_ABSENT
  • DUPLICATE_PROCESSING
  • SERVICES_NOT_PROVIDED
  • CANCELED_RECURRING
  • NOT_AS_DESCRIBED
  • COUNTERFEIT
  • MISREPRESENTATION
  • CANCELED

Type of product the dispute was opened Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • MERCHANDISE
  • DIGITAL_GOODS
  • SERVICE
  • EVENT

type of evidence document Possible values are:
  • OTHER - Any other proof you have that might help your case
  • PROOF_OF_ORDER - Proof that your customer ordered the product or service (invoice and/or order confirmation)
  • PROOF_OF_RECEIVING - Proof that your customer received the product or service (shipping and/or delivery confirmation)
  • PROOF_OF_USAGE - Proof that your customer accessed or downloaded the digital product or service (login details: date, IP address, etc)
  • TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS - Proof that your customer violated the Terms & Conditions or refund policy (Terms & Conditions)
  • ORDER_CONFIRMATION - Proof that your customer acknowledged placing or receiving the order (emails or messages with your customer)
  • RECEIPT_CONFIRMED_OR_DELAY_AGREED - Proof that your customer acknowledged receiving the order, or communication about the delay (emails or messages with your customer)
  • PROOF_OF_NO_COMPLAINS - Proof that your customer didnt complain to you about the product or service (emails or messages with your customer)
  • MULTIPLE_ORDER_ACKNOWLEDGED - Proof that your customer made multiple orders knowingly (emails or messages with your customer)
  • PROOF_OF_SEPARATE_ORDERS - Proof that each payment was for a different product or service (separate order and/or shipping confirmations)
  • CERTIFICATE_OF_AUTHENTICITY - Proof that the product or services is authentic and legitimate (certificate of authenticity)
